title: Could it actually be Victorious Jhin?
body:
The end of season 7 rewards post looked like it had some jokes it it, what if this is a bigger joke, saying it's Graves?

Proof here:
1. The light that hits the face should reflect from surfaces and still give a hint of light, only a mask behaves like a hole because the eye is behind.
2. Graves theme doesnt fit with a white glove, plus the lines hint at his hand.
3. A cracked eye on the weapon to hint us on the Jhin splash art?
And the last one, why I fliped it, was because on his splash art he is in a mirror, hinting to us maybe that we should actually mirror this and flip it?

What do you guys think? I heard Riot has a way of flipping things up with those things.
